    • Method Detail

      • post

        public int post(java.lang.String url,
       net.sf.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
        Post method to publish data to Dashing API. Dashng API expect to receive string in json format.

        e.g. Welcome widget expects :
        {"text": "Welcome"}

        e.g. Common Failure Cause widget expect :
        {"items": {"label": "Connection Error", "value": "20"}, {"label": "NullPointer Exception", "value": "44"}]}

        Specified by:
        post in interface DashingClient
        Parameters:
        url -
        jsonObject -
        Returns:
        response code
